alert.note: Alert for Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:06PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern San Juan and south central Kane Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 906 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wahweap, or near Page, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Water, Lake Powell, Paria Canyon, Stateline Wash Slot Canyon, Stud Horse Point and Labyrinth Canyon. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 0 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah
